CANNED_MGMT.LEARN_MORE: Tim hieu them ve thu mau phan hoi
CANNED_MGMT.DESCRIPTION: Thu mau phan hoi la cac mau tra loi viet san giup ban phan hoi nhanh cuoc hoi thoai. Nhan vien co the go ky tu '/' theo sau la ma ngan de chen thu mau phan hoi trong cuoc hoi thoai.
